revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Pledge Grove |image = [[File:Pledge Grove.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Pledge Grove. |tokens = 356,500 |location = Between Unova Route 19 & 20 }} '''Pledge Grove''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Unova]]. It initially has 81 tiles arranged in an 9x9 square, including 9 chest tiles, 21 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 5,203,000 HP.
==Encounter Tables==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Fearow.png|40px]] Fearow || rowspan=9 colspan=2|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Furret.png|40px]] Furret |- | [[File:Ledian.png|40px]] Ledian |- | [[File:Sudowoodo.png|40px]] Sudowoodo |- | [[File:Stantler.png|40px]]Stantler |- | [[File:Breloom.png|40px]] Breloom |- | [[File:Unfezant.png|40px]] Unfezant |- | [[File:Sawsbuck (Autumn).png|40px]] Sawsbuck (Autumn) |- | [[File:Sawsbuck (Winter).png|40px]] Sawsbuck (Winter) |}
===Boss Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Keldeo (Resolute).png|40px]] Keldeo (Resolute) || <center> 52,000,000 || colspan=3|<center> N/A |}
